Title: The Serpent
Plot: Leonardo continues his quest for the Book of Leaves. The Pope?s nephew arrives and meets his spy. Leonardo?s war designs fail, causing a rift with the Medicis. The Pope learns of Leonardo?s prowess.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Writer: David S. Goyer, Scott M. Gimple
GuestStars: Ken Bones, Tim Faraday, Grant Stimpson, Mark Sumner, Ross O'Hennessey, Andrew Brooke, Erik Madsen, Ian Pirie, David Sterne, Bill Thomas, Celyn Jones, Paul Westwood
